recipesJson.name: 123 Fruit Sprinkles
recipesJson.author: Kemmo
recipesJson.description: 123 Bandwagon time! Sweetener isn't needed due to all the glorious, coil destroying FW in here. But its delicious!

reviews.text: Just mixed this up, pretty good shake and vape. Not overly sweet and the cake batter dip does a good job at mitigating the strong lemon from fruity flakes. I may cut the percentages in half for CBD and FF and give it another go with some FLV Whipped Cream but glad I gave it a shot! Thank you! I'll try to update the review once I have more time with it.
